titles.title: When I look into your holiness

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
When I look into Your holiness,
When I gaze into Your loveliness,
When all things that surround me
Become shadows in the light of You.
When I find the joy of reaching Your heart,
And my will becomes enthroned in Your love,
And the things that surround me
Become shadows in the light of You,

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I worship You, I worship You.
The reason I live is to worship You.
I worship You, I worship You.
The reason I live is to worship You.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Cuando miro a tu Santidad
Cuando veo toda tu bondad
Cuando todas las cosas son sombras
En tu eterna luz.
Al sentir gozo en tocar tu corazón
Al descansar mi voluntad en tu amor
Cuando todas las cosas son sombras
En tu eterna luz.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
/Te adoro a ti, adoro a ti
yo vivo Señor para adorarte a ti./ (2)
